#      BUILD_SHARED_LIBS
#      – Switch between shared and static libraries

set(HEADER_FILES 
  include/vfspluginZIP.h
  include/vfspluginZIP_config.h
  include/vfspluginZIP_CZIPArchive.h
  include/vfspluginZIP_CZipIOAccess.h

)

set(SOURCE_FILES 
  src/vfspluginZIP.cpp
  src/vfspluginZIP_CZIPArchive.cpp
  src/vfspluginZIP_CZipIOAccess.cpp
)

# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES "" )

# Make sure the PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )




#******** END OF AUTOGENERATED CONTENT ********



add_library( vfspluginZIP ${ALL_FILES} )
add_dependencies( vfspluginZIP gucefVFS gucefCORE gucefMT zlib zziplib )
target_link_libraries( vfspluginZIP gucefVFS gucefCORE gucefMT zlib zziplib )
set_target_properties( vfspluginZIP PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "GUCEF_VFSPLUGIN_ZIP_BUILD_MODULE" )
GUCEF_config_plugin( vfspluginZIP )
